data.description:
This Umpire training helps you work on calls at home plate and at first base. More situations are in the roadmap. The training is available for baseball, fastpitch softball and slowpitch softball.
At home plate you can select the pitch speed (or height for slowpitch), the location, variations, spin and wind. And you can select if you want feedback directly during the pitch or afterwards.
At first base you can practice close calls or work in a game-like context where the system determines the timing. After the call you can replay the action to see if you made the right call.

changelog.change_log:
General: it is now possible to store user credentials
Homeplate drill: the app now uses voice recognition to detect if you say "Strike", "Ball" or a few other keywords like "Inside". Only English terms are recognized.

Homeplate drill: the app detects if the right arm is raised to determine a strike call or not.
Softball: leaving early drill added for first base
Graphics improved.

I am working on better animations, but that takes a lot of time to capture and process. Please bear with me on this.

Drill explanations added.
Keyboard click added for entering text

Database connectivity problem fixed



Breaking balls for baseball are now available
